description:
The flashback continues as Ace robs a ruthless gang of pirates, and Luffy is left to take the fall! Will Ace and his friend Sabo let Luffy be tortured to death - or will they risk their high seas dreams to save him?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here Comes Sabo! The Boy at the Gray Terminal!
Lui c`est Sabo ! Le garçon de Grey Terminal
Sabo Toujou! Gray Terminal no Shounen
Появление Сабо! Мальчишка из Серого терминала!
サボ登場! 不確かな物の終着駅[グレイ・ターミナル]の少年
